text: Reginald Herbert Worsman (born 19 March 1933) is an English former footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Bradford Park Avenue, Bradford City and Darlington. He also played non-league football for Nelson. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Bradford Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Nelson F.C. players Category:Darlington F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Reg Worsman
